sentences.english: The rate of the service totals UAH 25.
sentences.chinese: 这项服务的资费是25乌克兰赫夫米。

sentences.english: They are increasingly calling for fees to be increased to safeguard the quality of their teaching.
sentences.chinese: 要求增加资费以保障教学质量的呼声日益见长。

sentences.english: The proposal is seeking to spur competition among providers and put new caps on roaming charges.
sentences.chinese: 目的是要刺激运营商的竞争，制定漫游资费的新上限。

sentences.english: Non-basic postal rates shall be formulated by the competent department of postal services under the State Council.
sentences.chinese: 非基本资费由国务院邮政主管部门规定。

sentences.english: Below we have a look at China Telecom broadband charges.
sentences.chinese: 下面我们就来看看中国电信宽带资费情况。

sentences.english: Shenzhen investigates rigorously the fees trick of telecommunication postal service.
sentences.chinese: 深圳严查电信邮政资费猫腻。

definition: operator (of a power station, transport network etc)/carrier (telecommunications etc)
China Telecom (Chinese company providing mobile phone service)
set meal/product or service package (e.g. for a cell phone subscription)
to make a long distance call
China Mobile Tietong, state-owned telecommunications operator (abbr. for 中移鐵通|中移铁通[Zhong1 yi2 Tie3 tong1])
China United Telecommunications Corporation/aka China Unicom or Unicom/abbr. for 中國聯通|中国联通
webcast/to request item for broadcast on radio program/dibble seeding/spot seeding
